title: Someone's PC
subtitle: Video Game Strategy Tool
description: A full stack web app that streamlines strategic team planning for competitive Pokemon e-sports.
Built using the MERN stack (Mongoose, Express, React, Node). It employs JWT authentication, interfaces with the PokeAPI, and optimizes data presentation.
Users can create multiple teams with up to 6 Pokemon, each having unique data for competitive matches.

title: Glow - Party Professionals
subtitle: Mock Business Website
description: A Django application built for a fictional party planning service.
The application leverages PostgreSQL for data management, and is styled with Bootstrap with royalty free images from Unsplash.
The end user would be expected to request a booking through the contact form, or join the mailing list from the homepage call-to-action.

title: Playlist.me
subtitle: Music Discovery Tool
description: A React application that leverages the Spotify API and recommendation engine to build custom playlists.
It is a serverless application, fully supported by Google Cloud Functions.
Users can search for and select up to five songs from Spotifyâ€™s extensive library, and then receive suggested songs with strong similarities to the songs provided.
